text: Robert Wolfe (March 2, 1921 â€“ December 10, 2014) was an American historian and archivist. He was a World War II U.S. Army officer. He was a archivist of the US National Archives. He was wounded in both the Pacific and European Theaters of Operation. Wolfe was born in Burlington, Vermont. Wolfe died in Washington, D.C. from natural causes, aged 93. == References == * * * Category:1921 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American historians Category:American people of World War II Category:Writers from Vermont
title: Robert Wolfe
